QuestData.Title: We All Scream for Ice Cream... and then Die!
QuestData.Description: Don't get me wrong... I'm cheerful on the outside, but inside I'm just terribly torn to pieces. All of my friends and employees are dead.$B$BCould you do me a favor? Would you swim down there and attach the tug's tow hook to my dead employees? I'll reel them in.
QuestData.LogDescription: Attach the tug's tow hook to 10 Dead Employees.
QuestData.CompletionText: Could you hook a few more of their bodies for me?
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. They gave their lives for ice cream.
